snippet.title: Katawa Shoujo Opening
snippet.description:
The remastered opening  for the full version of Katawa Shoujo. Animation by Mike Inel, editing by delta, music by Blue123.
Download the full game at http://katawa-shoujo.com/
Visit the blog at http://katawashoujo.blogspot.com/
